Name: Kitty's Venture
About the game: Join the kitty in a challenging fast-paced adventure to hunt for Cat Points (CP). Kitty's Venture is a 2D side-scroller platformer game where you take control of a cute kitty. Play through three different stages with various obscure obstacles, collect Cat Points, and unlock achievements. Can you make it to the end? Kitty's Venture aims to deliver a challenging yet rewarding gameplay experience. Difficulty is one of the main focuses of the game. Expect the unexpected. Each of the three stages will challenge player with obscure obstacles. And the only way you can deal with them is by JUMPING. But the player has to be smart, and on point with the timing. To unlock achievements, you have to collect Cat Points (CP), and coins. Some other in-game actions and events will also award you with achievements. Features: - Fast-paced gameplay that requires quick response - Three different stages (more to come) - 81 unique achievements featuring cats - Challenging gameplay requiring patience and precision
